access.instructions:
Build Hivemind locally and point the processor to that binary.
1. cd Hivemind/hivemind
2. cargo build --release
3. export HM=\"$(pwd)/target/release/hivemind\"
4. export HIVEMIND_DATA_DIR=\"${RUN_DIR:-/tmp/hivemind-beta}/.hivemind-data\"
5. ensure git is installed (>=2.40) and accessible in PATH.

runtime.install: Install the OpenCode CLI from minimax.io (Minimax 2.1 build) and ensure it is executable. Set OPENCODE_BIN to the absolute path if not on PATH.
